definition: the uneven manner of walking that results from an injured leg, strap the foreleg and hind leg together on each side (of a horse) in order to keep the legs on the same side moving in unison
details:
noun
- the uneven manner of walking that results from an injured leg
= synonyms: hitch
- a shackle for the ankles or feet
= synonyms: fetter
verb
- strap the foreleg and hind leg together on each side (of a horse) in order to keep the legs on the same side moving in unison
= example: strap the foreleg and hind leg together on each side (of a horse) in order to keep the legs on the same side moving in unison
= synonyms: hopple
- walk impeded by some physical limitation or injury
= example: walk impeded by some physical limitation or injury
= synonyms: hitch
- hamper the action or progress of
= example: hamper the action or progress of
